changeSet.author: Rodrigo Nicolas Russillo
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `product` ( `id` BIGINT(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `deleted_at` DATETIME(6), `updated_at` DATETIME(6), `created_at` DATETIME(6), `description` VARCHAR(255), `name` VARCHAR(255), `price` FLOAT, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=9 CHARSET=latin1;
